testcase.classname: US_034 As an administrator, I want the Product List page to be able to access the product lists on the site.
testcase.name: TC_3416 It should be verified that the Delete link is visible on the select tab in the Action column in the Product List and that the Delete operation can be performed when clicked.
testcase.system-out: Given Go to "myUrl" page....................................................passed Then Enter a valid "Email" address and "Password" in the relevant fields on the page that opens, then click the SIGN IN button..passed Then Then a message about successful login should appear in a green box in the upper right corner of the screen..passed Then The Products Title should be clickable under the PRODUCT MANAGE title on the left side of the screen on the Dashboard page..passed Then Click on the link button titled Product Lists from the options listed under the Products Title..passed Then Click on any Select button opposite the products under the Action heading column for Delete..passed Then In the mini pop-up tab that opens it is checked whether the Delete button link is visible..passed Then Click the Delete and then click the Delete button in the mini alert window that will appear..passed Then Check that a green pop-up message appears in the upper right corner of the screen stating that the product has been Deleted Successfully..passed
